name: Best Before 90 Seconds
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 47 Compo Game Jam, made by one person, Best Before 90 Seconds is a fairly short incremental game about dairy and the end of the world. 

You have 90 seconds to make as much money as possible before the world ends and you are thrown into a time loop back where you started. Buy livestock, invest in products, hire people to help out, and purchase upgrades all in your quest to escape Armageddon!

Version 1.15 is the most up to date in terms of the Game Jam, all versions after were made after it ended, mainly bugfixes.
